attributes.action: Equate electric vehicles (e-bikes etc) to automotive transport.
attributes.additional_details: Electrical vehicles (e-bikes, e-scooters etc.) are capable of going in excess of 30 m/h causing high risk for pedestrians when driving on pavements. There is no control over their ownership and very often they are used by teenagers and people unconcerned about their danger
attributes.background: Change the rules so electrically assisted vehicles able to go over certain speed (I.e 10 m/h) should follow same traffic rules as cars: require registration, number plate, driving license and be banned from using pavements and pedestrian only spaces

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701672
